Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in London (Kilburn), The Black Lion is minutes from The Tricycle Theatre and close to Freud Museum. This inn is within close proximity of Hampstead Theatre and Lord's Cricket Ground.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 12 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Black Lion. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Black Lion. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in London (Kilburn), The Black Lion is minutes from The Tricycle Theatre and close to Freud Museum. This inn is within close proximity of Hampstead Theatre and Lord's Cricket Ground.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Tricycle Theatre - 0 km / 0 mi
Freud Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Hampstead Theatre - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Swiss Cottage Farmers' Market - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Everyman Cinemas - Hampstead - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Burgh House - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Hampstead Heath - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Keats House - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Lord's Cricket Ground - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Primrose Hill - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Portobello Road Market - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Electric Cinema - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
London Zoo - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Whiteleys Shopping Centre - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
London Business School - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 17.8 km / 11.1 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 19.1 km / 11.9 mi

The preferred airport for The Black Lion is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
